Chaitra-Shukla-1.Title: Yugadi
Chaitra-Shukla-1.Description: Yugadi marks the first new moon day of a new lunar calender year. i.e., Chaitra masa Shukla paksha Pratipada. https://madhurabhavageethegalu.blogspot.com/2012/06/yuga-yugadi-kaledaru.html

Chaitra-Shukla-5.Title: Dasha Lakshana Parva
Chaitra-Shukla-5.Description: Dasha Lakshna Parva begins on Chaitra Shukla Panchami

Chaitra-Shukla-14.Title: Dasha Lakshana Parva
Chaitra-Shukla-14.Description: Dasha Lakshna Parva completes on Chaitra Shukla Chaturdashi
